problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the square ABCD, AB = N_0, Q is the midpoint of CD, set ∠DAQ = α, take a point P on CD, make ∠BAP = N_1 α, then the length of CP is ()
raw_answer: 解:取BC的中点E,连接AE,作EF⊥AP,则△ABE≌△ADQ,得EB=EC=4,由≥ft\{\begin{matrix}AE=AE\\∠EFA=∠EBA\\∠BAE=∠FAE\\\end{matrix}\right.\得:△ABE≌△AFE,∴∠AEB=∠AEF,得EF=EB=EC,∵PE=PE,∴∠ECP=∠EFP=90°,∴△EPC≌△EPF,∴∠FEP=∠PEC,∴∠AEP=∠AEF+∠FEP=90°,∴∠PEF=∠PEC=∠EAP=∠EAB,∴△CEP∽△BAE,∴\frac{PC}{EC}=\frac{BE}{AB}=\frac{4}{8}=\frac{1}{2},即PC=2,故选:B．
